idea:
We have built a user friendly discovery platform having necessary functionalities & detailed technical classifications, keeping in mind the current offline buying & selling behaviour of the  
TG.
www.unstocker.com is India's first Online Marketplace for Industrial Products. Manufacturers and Traders can sell and buy Industrial products on this platform in real time. It can also be used by the sellers as their OWN ECOMMERCE PLATFORM.

The expected Industrial product portfolio on our website is finished goods, raw materials and also non-moving inventory.

Liquidating excess inventory is a global problem & with the market forcing manufacturers for
quick design changes and offering cost competitiveness, the problem of nonmoving  or obsolete inventory is growing with no immediate solution in sight. The differential between the purchase cost & liquidation cost is quite large. Even large & medium steel manufacturers are riddled with nonmoving stocks running in crores. This platform will enable not only liquidation options but offer price benefits both to the buyers & sellers. 

The team behind Unstocker has deep domain knowledge & handson  experience in industrial 
manufacturing, procurement & sales. They had launched a first of its kind  ‘portal’ for the 
machine tool industry during the (illfamed)  ‘DotCom’ era in 2001 & have successfully built 
arguably the first trueblue  Industrial Advertising agency of India, creating Marketing 
Communications in Conventional as well as New Media for many engineering companies.
name: IMAGINON TECH-VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a team of Architects & Engineers with 60+ years of cumulative experience in Retail.
Span was formed with a view to offer 360°solutions in Retail interior space. The Design, Build & Deliver approach would help reduce time and cost overruns for all Retail projects.
Our end to end solutions would save you 10% of the total CAPEX, catering factors of Quality, Schedule and Processes.
name: SPAN RETAIL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We intend to solve Parents and Students problem of India by discovering quality educational
coaching classes at affordable fees at very convenient location. Today students in India are
suffering from one of the two problems since a long time and had to choose only one of the
desirable things namely cost or quality , A Student had to manage costs he had the only
option of settling in a lesser known and a crowded Classroom with lesser attention drawn at
him.
 The business model of ‘Klassroom’ will solve both these problems by introducing the Indian
virtual educational brand ‘Klassroom’ which provides students with Quality in a cost effective
way. It aggregates budget educational institutes and classes, making inventory discoverable
and bookable online. Its branding provides a franchise-like consistency of all services includes
practical teaching aids ,limited size batch, good infrastructure, audio-visual technology, elite
teachers and centralized governance for quality and performance and it also provides
additional digital learning service called “Klassroomkonnect”.
 It’s a managed marketplace of Classes (Educational Institutes) by providing an web and app
based solution to locate and book admission at verified quality coaching classes at
affordable fees. We make money by charging 20 % of pre decided fees by Students.
name: FUSION KLASSROOM EDUTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Kibo is a social venture developing solutions to fix the blood banking supply chain in India. We are working towards implementing web and app platforms that will facilitate and encourage a habit of regular blood donation. We also aim to increase transparency in the existing blood banking system.
name: Kibo

idea: Kanhav petrochem pvt ltd is a startup which is trying put down a manufacturing plant in sayakha dahej for which the company has acquired land from the GIDC and will start procduction of textile chemical, petrochemicals and plywood chemicals
name: KANHAV PETROCHEM PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: DRiefcase - DRiefcase provides secure online, easy-to-use access to personal health records enabling its users and their families to maintain their medical records in one secure, central location and instantly access them anytime, anywhere.
name: DRiefcase

idea:
Mission - "Make India Read"

We are book lovers, on a social mission: To cultivate the habit of reading amongst the youth. Booklet is a free app for those who wish to read books but don't get enough time. 

Every week we read a bestselling book and create a Booklet (a book summary), going beyond a book review. 

Ok, don't like to read? We have audio book summaries too! You can now read or listen to a fat book in just 20 minutes! 

We try to cover all genres:

* Business & management
* Fiction
* Biography
* Self Improvement
* Health
name: Booklet - Mission Make India Read

idea:
E-Brand Care is targeting Residential & Corporate sector in Rural & Urban Areas for facilitating the services with the help of local Electrician, under our Strategic & Robust Process Model.Our Model will work on C2C base for creating uniqueness in the Electronic service industry. (For Example Ola Cabs,UBER etc.)

We are planning to improve Indian economy through our concept and increase the skilled manpower jobs, which would help to grow the India's financial structure & will try to work for growing the India's Electronic Industry for making India become a healthy & Financially strong country.

Our Aim is to reduce upcoming high level risks which we are not thinking right now but that will become a bigger issue in our country in coming few years.We are not starting the company for making money but building the steps in providing the poor class a chance to grow with us and who can benefit by working on commission base model for improving there life. 

Our aim is to generate skilled job pool in country and build health & wealthy society through our business vision. 

We need your support and help for building the Bright Future for Indians.
name: E-Brand Care - Make your Life easy !

idea: We are a tech platform helping the people at the bottom of the economic pyramid, especially women,  get better job opportunities with dignity, right on their phone, without any middleman. All that they need is a phone and Aadhar card to get calls from employers directly.  Since there is no intermediary with Helper4U, the scope for physical or financial exploitation at the hands of a middleman is drastically reduced. Employers on the other hand can hire verified Helpers, when they want them, without a middleman. Employers can find them and call them directly for interviews and jobs. We are also building an ecosystem around hiring of these job seekers: Verifications, Insurance, Resume creation, Contracts, job advertisements, mobile based trainings and job seeker network.
name: HELPER4U SERVICES LLP

idea:
Who are we?
FineHeal is a platform which connects Patients and Family with Healthcare providers. The platform allows those who are looking for options of places to undergo prescribed medical procedures. A simple platform, available online on web and mobile. It is free for patients.
Why FineHeal?
Currently, most of the Hospitals and Nursing Homes have to depend on an informal network of referral generators. Corporate hospitals tend to focus on marketing but many of those spends do not give results.
Over a period of time, the concept of family doctors has been replaced with specialists. Many specialists recommend their own hospitals for carrying out procedures and patients do not have really a way to figure out if he is getting a good deal or not.
FineHeal creates a market by aggregating the hospitals and allowing patients to directly interact with the Sales and Marketing teams of the Hospitals to make informed decisions.
name: Fine Heal Healthcare Services Pvt Ltd
